My text summed up (for all you lazy people out there):
Game enjoyment: 9/10

Dead by daylight has a great concept and it does make a lot of fun to play it with friends. I had the game since it came out, sadly it had a phase (towards the beginning) were it was unable to play. Since this issue got fixed I've started playing active again. But sadly, as I've noticed, the higher you've got with your rank, the more it got frustrating to play. The killers get worse and worse with each rank. Don't get me wrong, its not because they are actually bad players. Just the way they try to win the game with pure focus and camping. It's horrible and it's just ruining the fun. Another point is, the killers, perks and offerings are horribly unbalanced. There are some killers that require a lot of skill to handle, but others blindly kill everything around them, no matter how good the survivor is. As example: the cannibal. Basically same as the hillbilly, but his "ult" is just totally op. You don't get a chance at all to get away from him, and I've heard already people say "stun him with a pallet", well jokes on you. Anyways, same with some other "abilities": I recently was in a round were the killer, nurse, camped on a hooked survivor. All three of us tried to save or, but the killer wouldn't attack, instead, she waited for one to try and unhook her, but simply pulled that survivor away and on her shoulder. No chance to rescue! There would be so many ways to balance this game and do something against the campers, but apparently dlc killers are more important to develop (hint: they cost a lot. Are there perhaps some Ex EA developers hiding in the team?). Anyways, rarely we get into a round with a fair killer, and those are the rounds, that are still keeping me to this game.

And please, for the love of god, invest more time into fixing bugs and to balance this game. You can publish dlc's when the game is at least playable, then its worth its money.

Mega-Updating the review for the start of 2020!

This game had a lot of promise once. Shame the dev team are so inept they can't do a patch without breaking something in a gamedeciding way, sometimes reviving bugs patched out half a year earlier in the process, it's so bad it's almost funny. But it really really isn't when you end up on the receiving end of it.

Like most other asymmetrical team games (4v1) it's basically impossible to FULLY balance this game, but it's in a decent state balance-wise. The devs are trying their hardest. Basically if a fully geared out team uses voice comms, they're at an unfair advantage (because lack of information is literally a core game mechanic, that you can easily bypass through Discord/Teamspeak). Other than that, it's in the best place it's been in a long time.

Unfortunately i still have to leave it on a thumb down though. Because while the game balance in theory is in its best state ever, the developers decided to add Dedicated Servers to the game four months ago. And these dedicated servers are a catastrophy to a point that makes me want to go back to the Peer-to-peer hosting which birthed a FLOOD of hackers and cheaters, which led to the original thumb down in my review. That's right, i'd RATHER go back to an environment where every 5-10 games i get utterly destroyed by a hacker, than playing on the current environment of dedicated servers. 

They cause two to three DOZEN lag-based game deciding problems in each individual match. Meaning you're likely to eat anywhere between 8-10 game deciding lag messups yourself in each match. It's just utterly unplayable, and a shame.

Average player count is down despite the third massive sale on the game in three months, and for a good reason. As long as those dedicated servers stay enabled, you should stay away.

My heart bleeds for the obvious potential this game has.

Bardzo Fajny Horror!!!

Very Fun, Very Toxic, Very Salty, 

You play as either Survivor or Killer. Survivor tries to escape and Killers Camp and Tunnels until everyone dies.

Here are the unwritten rules for Survivors and Killers

Rules as a Survivor: 
                  Carry Insta Flashlight and Decisive Strike
                  Infinite loop/ Abuse pallets
                  Body block and Crouch Spam whenever killer is present
                  Win at all cost (even if it gets all your teammates killed/sacrificed)
                  Tell the killer he is reported, even if he did nothing wrong.

Rules as a Killer:
                  Don't be Salty/Toxic
                  Don't Camp/ Don't Tunnel
                  Don't play as Nurse, Hag, Myers, Doctor, or Freddy Please (or any other killers I don't like, which is basically all of them)
                  Respect 4% rule
                  Don't bring Mori offering
                 
1000s of problems/bugs:
Killers OP, Nerf Plz
Bad matchmaking = long wait time
Bad servers = laggy as hell
Everyone is a bit toxic including myself...
Game SLIGHTY favors survivor, 

You WILL get salty, and you should probably buy it on sale.

Расскажу свое мнение об этой игре в краце. Игра сама по себе хорошая, задумка и геймплей тоже. Но баги которые в этой игре, это что-то с чем то. Я когда впервые увидел эту игру, я в неё сразу же влюбился. Почему я в неё влюбился? спросите вы, а я вам отвечу. Я её полюбил потому что я изначально люблю хорроры, да и саму тематику убийц в целом. И как бы я не материл эту игру, и их разработчиков, в какую бы помойку она не превращалась, я всегда буду её любить и не перестану в неё играть.

Ein sehr atmosphärisches, aufregendes und spaßiges Spiel. Vor allem mit Freunden hat man hier viel Spaß, aber auch alleine entwickelt das einen besonderen Flair. Die Kommunity ist durchgehend in Ordnung. Einen totalen Camper-Killer erwischt man selten. 
Ein sehr tolles Spiel, trotz immer gleichen Spielmodi.

I'm a very new player that hopped in recently after watching Youtubers I'm subscribed to play this game. Perhaps, it's because I'm not competitive by nature, but I'm having fun playing by myself. I think one of the good things about this game is that there are a variety of survivors and killers to play as without purchasing DLC, each character unique and bringing something new to the table.

This is a game you don't want to hop in blind however. Watch videos for tips on playing as a survivor or a killer to help you become familiar with the game faster.

The community is supposedly toxic these days from what I heard, but I feel like if you enjoy the game for what it is, it'll be a good time. If you prefer being a survivor, playing with friends makes the game even more fun.

Определенно рекомендуется к прохождению.

[h1]"Dead by Daylight-симулятор уроков для  будущих маньяков и жертв" [/h1]

[h1]Если Вы садист или хочется убивать людей,но боитесь в реальной жизни сесть в тюрьму?Тогда игра для Вас [/h1]

[h1]Маньяк может :[/h1]

[h1]1.Выбрать своего психапата [/h1]Выбираешь одного из маньяков:есть одна часть платных и бесплатных.Каждый из них имеет свои способности и слабости
[h1]2.Выбираем оружие и вид маньяка[/h1]Можем одевать маски,брать разные оружия для убийства. Можем так же купить DLC для большего удовольствия.
[h1]3.Прокачка способностей.[/h1] Во время игры нам дают очки крови. За кровь мы можем прокачивать умения маньяка.
[h1]4.Рандом отсутствует ! Только маньяк[/h1]Мы можем играть только за маньяка . Есть некоторые игры в которых стоит рандом на выбор стороны. В даной игре ты сам решаешь кем и когда быть.
[h1]5.Твоя карта-твоя стратегия ада[/h1]Ты сам решаешь как убивать своих жерт.Придумуешь тактику и стратегию для убийства всех игроков.

[h1]Выживший может:[/h1]
[h1]1.Чинить генераторы;[/h1]
[h1]2.Спасать своих((снимать с крюков,поднимать с земли и лечить)) ;[/h1]
[h1]3.Тролить маньяка  [/h1]
[h1]4.Светить фонариком в лицо;[/h1]
[h1]5.Спрятаться в шкафчиках:[/h1]
[h1]6.Выживать с друзьями;[/h1]
[h1]7.Убежать от маньяка; [/h1]
[h1]8.Прокачивать свои споcобности:[/h1]
[h1]9.Украсить свой внешний вид:[/h1]

[h1]Советую купить игру всем и особенно для  тех кто играл Пятницу 13 [/h1]

[h1]Эту игру нельзя оценивать. Это шедевр и его можно  назвать "Театр маньяка и жерт"[/h1]

PONTOS POSITIVOS:
Facil de pegar o jeito, que ajuda os novos jogadores.
Sempre atualizado, de maneira em que tente evitar bugs e coisas op's
Dificuldade em pegar seus novos perks, o que é bom, para que gastemos tempo e tenhamos objetivos além de "só jogar".
Muito divertido de jogar com amigos.

PONTOS NEGATIVOS:

Muitos BUGS (realmente muitos bugs)
Os farmadores (pessoas que farmam pontos em ranks mais facil, ou que pedem para amigos ajuda-los a pegar rank/pontos)
As dlc's são um pouco caras.

ANALISE GERAL:
O jogo é muito bom, as vezes buga , mas é bem pouco, dou um 11/10, além do fato que nunca enjooa, sempre colocão novas dlc's, e tudo, um dos únicos problema é que eles deixam alguns Killers bem roubados...
Realizzato Malissimo ma è divertente

[h1]As veteran of this game i say: this game is not bad, but...[/h1]

Art design of this game is great: characters, music, maps, atmosphere.
But this is a game, and what is important in a game? That's right, [u]the gameplay[/u], and in this game the gameplay is [strike]almost not changed since the release[/strike] [b]very frustrating[/b].
The gameplay part is haunted by many minor bugs [strike]some of them hasn't been fixed since the release[/strike] and health of the game is VERY LOW. 
First problem is [b]connection issues[/b],
And second problem is
[b]BALANCE.[/b]

Balancing the gameplay is crucial for games, espicially for multiplayer one's.
Balance in this game is poor in many things: Powers of the Killers, perks for the both sides, design of some maps that favors one of the sides and "Survive With Friends".

[b]Powers of the Killers:[/b]
Some of them are very weak, and some of them are unfair.
Let's take The Nurse for example: The Nurse can teleport through walls and and crucial elements of chases, pallets and windows. The Nurse forces to play in mindgames. "Just learn how to mindgame, duh." But The Nurse can ignore all these crucial elements of chases like no other Killer can. The Nurse changes the gameplay to her, the special one, and this silly.
Other example is The Spirit: 
The Spirit has this same problem, changing the gameplay for the special one, The Spirit can become invisible, and can not be detected any how, Survivors can only predict, silly again.

[b]Perks:[/b]
Perks can be: useless, decent, great and HEX.
HEX perks are...difficult. Their power is dependant on the map knowledge of Survivors.

[b]Maps:[/b]
Some maps are good for the both sides, some maps are good for only one side.

[[b]Survive With Friends:[/b]
Basically, voice chat is the best perk for Survivors.

[i]P.S. Also there is grind and partial Pay To Win.[/i]

This game is Awesome

You can play as killers known from horror movies (Freddy Krueger, Leatherface, Jason Voorhees and a lot of them);

But as a Killer - you have really difficult work
You must find survivors and try catch them (on the hook) - but this isn't difficult part | so what's terrible think? - People in Random game

Why people?
In random match (as Killer), if you have lucky, you can meet really good people - however more players are [b] "Children" not taught to lose match. [/b] They always angry (if they lose) and sending you offensive content or reports or both that thinks. Yea, it's true - if you are relly good as  killer (in random match) get ready to be treated like a cheater or a trash.

So why I recommend this game?
This game have a beatiful scenerio (like horror movies) and there are a lot of fun (of course if you have lucky with people in random game), but what I love in here? I love playing with my friends (yes you can - max 5 players) and there are a lot of smiling. Im enjoy that.

I encourage you to buy this game- I have not seen so much joy and laughter yet.
[b] I hope you will find good people - they are still there [/b]
